means: 说话，谈话，说话能力或方式

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"演讲，讲话，报告"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: address, speech, lecture, oration, report, talk
means: address ：正式用词，指在庄严隆重的场合作精心准备的演讲或正式演说。
speech ：普通用词，指一般的发言或讲话，可以是事先准备的，也可以是即席的。
oration ：常指在特殊场合，辞藻华丽，形式庄重，旨在激发听众感情的正式演说。
report ：一般是指下级给上级或负责人给委托机关的书面或口头报告。
talk ：常用词，强调非正式讲话，讲话方式一般较为自由。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"语言"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: laguage, speech, tongue, dialect, idiom, slang
means: laguage ： 普通用词，含义广。指人的语言或文字，或动物的语言。既可指口头或书面语言，也可指手势语等。
speech ： 特指人的口语，也指正式的讲话。
tongue ： 书面用词，指人的语言，亦指人的母语。
dialect ： 指一种语言中，某一地方所特有的语言形式，即方言。
idiom ： 指一种语言中一般由几个词结合成短语或句子的特殊表达方式，即惯用语、成语。也指方言。

word_mean: 言语，语言：表达思想的声音
以给定自然语言所讲的话音模式，或模拟这种模式的声学信号。

sentence.Network_cn: 在一次煽情的演讲中，他说他要辞职。

sentence.Network_cn: 他不想刻意重复那种讲话的语调。

sentence.Network_en: He went even further in his speech to the conference.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在大会发言中作了更进一步的阐述。

means.word_mean: 讲演,演说,说教,长篇大论

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English spræc, sprēc, later spēc, of West Germanic origin: related to Dutch spraak, German Sprache, also to speak

entry.def: Speech is the ability to speak or the act of speaking.

example.ex: Intoxication interferes with speech and coordination.
example.tran: 醉酒会影响言语能力和协调性。

entry.def: Your speech is the way in which you speak.

example.ex: His speech became increasingly thick and nasal...
example.tran: 他说话的声音变得越来越粗，鼻音越来越重。

example.ex: I'd make fun of her dress and imitate her speech.
example.tran: 我会拿她的衣着开玩笑，并模仿她说话。

entry.tran: 口语，言语(与书面语相对而言)

example.ex: He could imitate in speech or writing most of those he admired.
example.tran: 他能模仿大多数自己崇拜的偶像的讲话和写作风格。

example.ex: ...the way common letter clusters are usually pronounced in speech.
example.tran: 普通字母组合在口语中的常见读法

entry.def: A speech is a formal talk which someone gives to an audience.

example.ex: She is due to make a speech on the economy next week...
example.tran: 她将在下周作一个关于经济的演讲。

example.ex: He delivered his speech in French.

entry.def: A speech is a group of lines spoken by a character in a play.

example.ex: ...the hilarious speech from Alan Bennett's 'Forty Years On'.
example.tran: 艾伦·贝内特的《弹指四十年》中的一段非常有趣的台词

means.word_mean: 1. the act of delivering a formal spoken communication to an audience;

sentences.sentence: "he listened to an address on minor Roman poets"
"he recorded the spoken language of the streets"
"he could hear them uttering merry speeches"
"they were perfectly comfortable together without speech"

means.word_mean: 5. your characteristic style or manner of expressing yourself orally;

sentences.sentence: "his manner of speaking was quite abrupt"
"I detected a slight accent in his speech"
"a good lecture was my father's idea of discipline"
"the teacher gave him a talking to"

means.word_mean: 7. words making up the dialogue of a play;
8. the mental faculty or power of vocal communication;

sentences.sentence: "language sets homo sapiens apart from all other animals"

Sentence.sentence: Mr Obama's plan to curb carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions (排放), though necessary, will be far from cost-free, whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest.
She is fond of telling stories in her speech.
I'm preparing for the speech contest.

means.word_mean: 说话, 言谈, 言语, 说话能力

sentences.en: He lost his power of speech.
I think young people are sometimes disrespectful in their speech.
sentences.cn: 我认为年轻人有时说话失礼。

means.word_mean: 演说, 演讲, 讲话

sentences.en: His speech was cheered by the audience.
sentences.cn: 他的演说博得听众的喝彩。

jushi.english: The native speech of Guangdong is still popular among Chinese Americans in China Town.
jushi.chinese: 广东方言在唐人街美籍华人中仍很流行。

jushi.english: The dinner and speeches occupied more than three hours.
jushi.chinese: 宴会和演讲占了三个多小时。

jushi.english: By her speech, we can tell that she is from Shanghai.
jushi.chinese: 听她的口音我们知道她是上海人。
